title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with any model served by the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; runs in Node, Deno, or browsers via the Ollama REST API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface); manage models & conversations in the browser.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI tool that wraps Ollama for chat, model listing, and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline code completion and refactoring suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and autoscaling support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers sync/async APIs and streaming for JVM projects.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for interacting with Ollama; supports generate, chat, and embeddings endpoints.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-to-use Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, and GPU support for quick local labs.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration that lets you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for function calling, fine-tuning, and advanced prompting with Ollama.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Streamlit chatbot template that connects to Ollama for quick prototyping of domain-specific bots.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that uses local Ollama models to summarize notes and generate writing suggestions.

title: Ollama Reddit Community
summary: Active subreddit for discussing new models, troubleshooting, and sharing Ollama projects and benchmarks.

title: Ollama on Hacker News
summary: Discussion thread covering Ollama’s 0.2 release with tool-use and JSON mode features.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module that injects Ollama clients as providers for building scalable LLM backends.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial C#/.NET client for Ollama with support for streaming chat and embeddings via REST.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app providing admin-configurable Ollama models and REST endpoints for chat/completion.
